snippet: A trader at Morgan Stanley Smith Barney blew past his $116 million trading limit to amass a $1.3 billion bet in 2009, Financial Industry Regulatory Authority records show, according to Bloomberg News.
abstract: A trader at Morgan Stanley Smith Barney blew past his $116 million trading limit to amass a $1.3 billion bet in 2009, Financial Industry Regulatory Authority records show, according to Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Smith Barney Trader's Big Bet
